content: for yarn with good elasticity and sleeve length = 11cm memory a wool or wool blend from underarm to cast off suggested yarn edge white gum wool ethical superfine merino 8ply body circumference = 36 5cm 236m/100g gum grey 1 skein approximately 1 5cm positive ease visit www whitegumwool com au to fit a small newbornbaby with chest circumference of 35cm or estimated weight of 2
